name: Luster Purge
description: You create a blinding bright light that damages creature's eyes and may lower their defense. Creatures in range must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 3d10 + MOVE psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. For creatures that fail by 5 or more, any attack against them has advantage until the end of your next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: Badly startles Pokemon that used a move of the same type.
